name: Prehistoric park builder (itch)
description: You have just been given a plot of land and the worlds best genetic scientists to build a prehistoric theme park. In this tycoon, you will be able to make an amazing theme park filled with dinosaurs. Click and move the mouse around to move objects and space to place them. Note : when you first start to play the game a blue screen will say 0/0. Please be patient if you have a slow computer because it will take a while to load.
